items.longDescription:
- Soft and airy linen blend fabric with a subtle glossy sheen.
- Relaxed cut with dropped shoulders.
- Short sleeves and casual stand collar.
- Slightly relaxed regular fit for easy styling as an outer layer.
- Name label. *The number of buttons varies across sizes.
items.name: KIDS Linen Cotton Stand Collar Shirt
items.shortDescription: Lightweight and comfortable fabric. The relaxed cut makes it a great outer layer.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.longDescription:
- Cool and comfortable 100% cotton chambray.
- Lightweight fabric with an airy cut.
- Features voluminous sleeves.
- A stylish statement blouse.
- Stretchy elastic at the shoulders and neckline for easy outfit changes.
items.name: GIRLS Chambray Gather Blouse

items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.composition: 68% Cotton, 31% TENCEL™ Modal, 1% Spandex/ TENCEL™ is a trademark of Lenzing AG.
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- Non-clingy cotton-blend seersucker fabric.
- Flat elastic in the shoulders provides added stretch for easy outfit changes.
- A camisole blouse with a distinctive gathered design at the shoulders and chest.
- Makes a light and breezy single layer.
- Colors and patterns created with advanced printing techniques.
- Also great for layering over a T-shirt.
items.name: GIRLS Gather Camisole Blouse
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.
